data.title: To contact us
data.text:
Find out more about:

Access, opening times, exhibitions, prices, etc.

Consult the Practical information page

Or contact us by telephone +33 (0)1 44 78 12 33, from Monday to Saturday (except public holidays) from 9 am to 7 pm.

Group bookings

Consult the Professional offers and prices page

Or contact us by telephone +33 (0)1 44 78 12 57, from Monday to Friday (except public holidays) from 9 am to 5 pm.

The Centre Pompidou annual Pass

Consult the Member page

Or contact us:

by telephone +33 (0)1 44 78 14 63, from Monday to Saturday (except public holidays) from 9 am to 7 pm.

by email

Multiple ticket sales

Consult the Professional offers and prices page

Or contact us:

by telephone +33 (0)1 44 78 14 08, from Monday to Saturday (except public holidays) from 9 am to 7 pm.

by email

Educational action

Consult the Visit > School groups page

Or contact us by email

Offers dedicated to social mediators

Consult the Social mediators page

Or contact us by email

Visitors with disabilities

Consult the Accessibility page

Or contact us by email

Jobs and training courses

Consult the Jobs and training courses page

For any unsolicited application for an internship or a job, please submit an online application.

Centre Pompidou works

For a loan requests and reproductions, consult the Loan and reproduction requests page.

Requests for authorisation of rights for works in the Centre Pompidou collection: contact the rights holders directly.

Authentication and valuing of works: contact a gallery or a professional art dealer

For a refund request
